title: Cannot start League of Legends
body:
I can't start the league client for the past 2 weeks now. I tried reinstalling the game and updating my drivers, but none of them seems to work. Please tell me the solutions to this problem.
Thanks

replies.body: the launcher fails for me as well but if I right click and run as admin it bypasses the launcher and goes straight into the client if you've selected keep me signed in

Your best bet is going to be submitting a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

It would also be worthwhile to include much more info in your ticket. 

The issue itself:

1. When and how does it happen (does it start to do something but then fail? Does nothing happen at all? Does it give you any error messages?) 
1. Does it happen every single time? Most?
1. When did the issue start? (Was it after a patch or an OS update? Just a random day? After a restart?)

Your setup:

1. Windows or Mac? 
2. What version OS?
1. Do you have the normal login or the new one that is being rolled out to some people?
3. Have you had any issues with any other programs in this time?

Fixes you've tried already:

1. Did you clean reinstall through the Hextech Repair Tool, was it a regular old add/remove programs uninstall, or did you just delete your game folder?
2. While it seems safe to assume you mean GPU drivers, in case it wasn't, have you updated those?

You should include the answers to all of that in your ticket since it will save them and you the time of them having to write back and ask.
